mean_en: to make somebody feel upset because of something you say or do that is rude or embarrassing; to seem unpleasant to somebody; to be against what people believe is morally right
sentence: Comments from online haters offended her.
sentence_trans: 网络喷子的言论冒犯了她。
word_etyma: of反对 + fend打击 → 一再打击 → offend冒犯，得罪
